name: dua-library-firebase
description: Tools for building and managing the RIZQ iOS dua library via Firebase Firestore - research, populate, validate, and organize authentic Islamic duas
author: RIZQ App Team

skills.name: add-dua-firebase
skills.description: Add a single dua to Firebase Firestore with all required fields (Arabic text, transliteration, translation, source, etc.)

skills.name: create-journey-firebase
skills.description: Create a new themed journey (collection of duas) in Firebase with time-slot assignments

skills.name: populate-batch-firebase
skills.description: Populate multiple duas from the dua library documentation into Firebase Firestore

skills.name: validate-library-firebase
skills.description: Validate the dua library in Firebase for completeness, authenticity, and data quality

skills.name: library-status-firebase
skills.description: Show current status of the Firebase dua library - counts, categories, journeys, and gaps

commands.name: dua-add-firebase
commands.description: Interactive command to add a new dua to Firebase Firestore with guided prompts

commands.name: journey-create-firebase
commands.description: Interactive command to create a new journey in Firebase

commands.name: library-sync-firebase
commands.description: Sync duas from documentation to Firebase Firestore

commands.name: library-report-firebase
commands.description: Generate a report of the current Firebase library status

agents.name: dua-researcher-firebase
agents.description: Research and find authentic duas with proper hadith sources, Arabic text, and scholarly verification

agents.name: dua-populator-firebase
agents.description: Format and insert duas into Firebase Firestore with proper validation

agents.name: journey-builder-firebase
agents.description: Design and create themed journeys by selecting and organizing duas in Firebase

agents.name: content-validator-firebase
agents.description: Validate dua content in Firebase for authenticity, completeness, and data quality

agents.name: library-curator-firebase
agents.description: Curate and organize the Firebase dua library - manage categories, suggest improvements, identify gaps
